activities: physician data, employee data and website visitor data (in order to respond to visitor inquiries)
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: off-line, on-line, manually processed, human resources data
recoursemech: For unresolved complaints, we will participate in the dispute resolution procedures of the panel established by the EU Data Protection Authorities (DPAs) and cooperate with the Swiss Federal Data Protection and Information Commissioner (FDPIC).
